title: Startup Grind – Startup Programme
subtitle: Startup Grind offre un programme en ligne avec des cours et du matériel pédagogique.  Présentez votre startup à plus de 200 investisseurs et 4000 clients potentiels lors de la conférence mondiale.  Obtenez des conseils, du financement et augmentez votre visibilité.

Startup Grind – Startup Programme

Your startup, on show, and connected with over 200 investors

Want to exhibit your startup at Startup Grind’s Global Conference? 

Apply to exhibit at our Conferences and show your ideas to 200+ investors and 4,000+ potential new customers.

APPLY HERE

This application ensures that the investors attending the event are impressed with the quality of founders and startups we are presenting them. That way they will come back next year and it gives you a better chance of getting advice / funding. 

Startup Grind is excited to potentially offer you a place at our most valuable & visible event in history.

APPLY HERE

title: Fashionomics Africa Incubator and Accelerator Program
subtitle: Le programme Fashionomics Africa Incubation et Accélération soutient les entrepreneurs africains du secteur textile et de l'habillement.  Il offre des formations en ligne, un accès aux marchés et du financement pour développer leurs entreprises et participer à la chaîne de valeur mondiale.
meta_description: Programme d'incubation et d'accélération pour les entrepreneurs africains du textile et de l'habillement. Candidatures jusqu'au 20/10/2024.
organizer_name:
Explore
About
Sign in
Fashionomics Africa Incubator and Accelerator Program

Increasing Africa’s participation in the global textile and apparel value chain

The African Development Bank, the implementing team; EyeCity Africa, IMPACT Lab, and the CcHUB Group, are announcing the call for applications for the second year of the  Fashionomics Africa Incubator and Accelerator Programs.

This initiative aims to support African entrepreneurs in the Fashion, Textile, Apparel, and Accessories (TA&A) industry in expanding their businesses. Fashionomics Africa is an initiative of the African Development Bank that aims at increasing Africa’s participation in the global textile, apparel, and accessories value chains. The objective is to support the growth of micro, small and medium-sized enterprises that dominate this industry, equipping them with the necessary business skills, financial acumen, access to markets, market intelligence, and financing opportunities to scale up their businesses in an increasingly digitised economy. Africa’s fashion and textile industries are a powerhouse, ranking as the continent’s second-largest employer and boasting a market size of $31 billion in 2020.

Applications for the second year of the Fashionomics Africa Incubator and Accelerator Programs will close on 20/10/2024 To apply, participants are required to fill out an online form which takes 3 to 5 minutes to complete.

You can access the application form using this link: [English, French, Portuguese, Arabic]

0
Closed
October 20
Organizer	African Development Bank (AFDB)
Website	Visit website
Targets	Africa
Sectors	Clothing and textiles production

title:
Giando Africa Limited t/a Flash Credit Africa
Tailored Finance for Growth
subtitle: Flash Credit Africa offre des solutions de financement numérique sur mesure pour les entrepreneurs et les particuliers sous-desservis par les banques traditionnelles au Kenya.  Des processus simplifiés et des taux compétitifs permettent d'accéder facilement au crédit et de stimuler la croissance économique.
meta_title: Flash Credit Africa: Prêts numériques au Kenya
meta_description: Flash Credit Africa révolutionne l'accès au financement au Kenya grâce à une plateforme de prêt numérique, offrant des solutions sur mesure aux entrepreneurs et aux particuliers.
description: Empowering dreams, our digital lending platform revolutionizes access to finance. With streamlined processes and competitive rates, we unlock opportunities for entrepreneurs and individuals underserved by traditional banks. Our commitment to inclusivity drives economic growth, creating jobs, increasing incomes, and reaching communities with tailored financial solutions. Join us in reshaping the future of finance and empowering lives, one loan at a time. Sectors Financial services Location Nairobi, Kenya Stage Sign in to view details Markets Sign in to view details Customer model Sign in to view details Revenue Sign in to view details Contact Sign in to view details Social media

title: How grants and awards can help startup entrepreneurs, by Dotun Olowoporoku – Startup Setup 9
subtitle: Cet épisode de Startup Setup explore les avantages et les inconvénients des subventions et des prix pour les startups. Dotun Olowoporoku, directeur associé des investissements chez Novastar Ventures, guide les fondateurs sur la manière de déterminer si les subventions conviennent à leur startup et comment éviter les pièges.
meta_title: Subventions et prix pour startups africaines
meta_description: Découvrez comment les subventions et les prix peuvent aider votre startup africaine.  Conseils d'experts sur les avantages, les inconvénients et quand postuler.
organizer_logo_alt: Logo de VC4A ou Novastar Ventures
main_image_alt: Image promotionnelle de l'épisode Startup Setup sur les subventions pour startups
description: Some startups need help building an MVP to prove or validate a business model. In this hack, Dotun Olowoporoku – Associate Investment Director at Novastar Ventures, encourages and warns founders about the benefits and pitfalls of grants. Find out when it’s a good idea for your startup and also where to draw the line. VentureReady Hacks with Dotun Olowoporoku Startup Setup series Maybe you are figuring out what kind of company to set up or exploring an idea you want to develop; You may have a few doubts, dilemmas, misconceptions, and questions that you’d like to clear up for yourself before you quit your day job. Starting a business is a major decision not to be taken lightly, but it’s also a great adventure. Like everything in life, the way you start is likely to have a lingering impact on everything that follows. The Startup Setup series of hacks is about helping you prepare for life as a startup founder or leader. The best advice you can get is from those who successfully traveled that same path, who are farther along in their journey, or who have spent a lot of time in the ecosystem working alongside budding entrepreneurs. Next steps If you liked that knowledge nugget, you will enjoy the Start Your Business course in the VC4A Startup Academy For realtime expert guidance click through to the Mentorship Marketplace where you can make a mentorship request to hundreds of mentors Discover advice on how to initiate, structure and develop a great relationship with mentors in the Mentorwise Podcast Learn about resilience strategies and get priceless advice from some of our community’s most successful startup founders in the Founder Series podcast entrepreneurship founder series founders growth Mentorwise plan scale startup startup setup traction vc4a ventureready hacks
draft_summary: Dotun Olowoporoku, de Novastar Ventures, discute des avantages et des inconvénients des subventions pour les startups. Il explique comment déterminer si une subvention est adaptée à votre entreprise et comment éviter les pièges courants.

title: Latitude59 Pitch Competition: Kenya
subtitle: Latitude59, événement phare estonien de la tech, organise un concours de pitch pour les startups africaines.  Un prix d'un million d'euros est offert au vainqueur, avec une invitation à l'événement principal en Estonie. La compétition se déroulera à Nairobi le 28 novembre 2024.
meta_title: Latitude59 Pitch Competition Kenya - 1M€ de prix
meta_description: Concours de pitch Latitude59 pour startups africaines. 1M€ de prix et invitation à Tallinn. Date limite: 1er novembre.
organizer_name:
Explore
About
Sign in
Latitude59 Pitch Competition: Kenya

Estonia’s flagship startup and tech event

Latitude59, Estonia’s flagship startup and tech event, is seeking early-stage startups from across Africa to compete for a prize pool of non-equity funding. 




The 12th edition of Latitude59 was held in Tallinn in May, and attracted over 3,500 attendees, including more than 900 startup representatives and nearly 600 investors. 

African startups are invited to apply for the Latitude59 pitch competition, which will take place at next year’s edition of the event. Selected finalists will pitch at a Latitude59 Kenya edition conference in Nairobi on November 28, with one African startup receiving an invitation to participate in the main event.




For two years in a row, the prize pool for the Latitude59 pitch competition has been EUR1 million (US$1.1 million).




Applications are open here until November 1.

title: AGriDI Grants for Digital Innovations in West Africa
subtitle: Le programme AGriDI offre des subventions pour des innovations numériques agricoles en Afrique de l'Ouest.  Il vise à améliorer la productivité agricole, les liens commerciaux et les politiques, en particulier pour les femmes et les jeunes agriculteurs.  Des financements jusqu'à 300 000 EUR sont disponibles.
meta_title: Subventions AGriDI pour l'innovation numérique agricole en Afrique de l'Ouest
meta_description: AGriDI offre des subventions jusqu'à 300 000 EUR pour des innovations numériques agricoles en Afrique de l'Ouest.  Améliorez la productivité et les marchés agricoles. Candidature ouverte !
organizer_name:
Explore
About
Sign in
AGriDI Grants for Digital Innovations in West Africa

Accelerating Inclusive Green growth through Agri-based Digital Innovation in WA

icipe under its European Union, ACP Innovation Funded project on “Accelerating inclusive green growth through agri-based digital innovation in West Africa” (AGriDI) invites  proposals on innovative digital solutions that promote adoption of digital technologies for improved agricultural productivity for farmers and agroprocessors in West Africa.

AGriDI Grants for Digital Innovations in West Africa will increase identification, adaptation, and use of agri-based digital technologies by farmers, especially women and youth. The grants will enhance agricultural production and marketing though strengthened linkages between research communities, industry, and policy actors, and improved policy environment.

Grants

EUR 2.7 million is available for three grant categories:

Category 1- To support co-development and adaptation of digital innovations to enhance agricultural Productivity.

Category 2- To support digital innovative solutions to establish market linkages for farmer’s produce

Category 3- To support development of policies to support digital innovations

Target applicants

Universities, research institutes, legally registered small and medium enterprises, farmer cooperatives, private sector corporations, technology hubs, innovation labs, start-ups, Community Based Organizations, Civil Society Organizations, government ministries, departments and agencies

Eligible countries 

Benin, Burkina Faso, Cabo Verde, Côte d’Ivoire, The Gambia, Ghana, Guinea, Guinea-Bissau, Liberia, Mali, Niger, Nigeria, Senegal, Sierra Leone, and Togo.

AGriDI will provide competitive grants to support the development of tangible digital solutions that address real challenges for smallholder farmers and agribusinesses in the ECOWAS region of West Africa.

Grant Size per project: EUR 150,000 – 300,000

For more information read the Call for Proposal in English or French.

title: ChangeMakers Seed Grant Opportunity 2021
subtitle: Gagnez une subvention de 1000 $ pour votre projet innovant ! StartupXs soutient les jeunes entrepreneurs dans le développement de leurs entreprises. Cette opportunité s'adresse aux startups, entreprises sociales et innovateurs ayant une idée prometteuse.
meta_description: Participez au ChangeMakers Seed Grant 2021 et tentez de remporter 1000$ pour votre startup ou entreprise sociale. Date limite : 31 décembre 2020.
organizer_name:
Explore
About
Sign in
ChangeMakers Seed Grant Opportunity 2021

Enter for a chance to win $1000 in seed funding!

StartupXs has launched “ChangeMakers Seed Grant Opportunity 2021” for startups and social enterprises who want to change their community with their innovative business ideas.

This year also the ChangeMakers Seed Grant Opportunity 2021 is about identifying and promoting the best early-stage business idea of innovators, startups, and social enterprises.

StartupXs supports young entrepreneurs through the early stages of their company development. We believe that in this era where startup and social enterprise are using innovative approaches and tools to solve the current issues, not only in their community but globally, need resource support to sustain and one of them is finance.

Change Makers Seed Grant Opportunity will choose and award 1 (one) changemaker with a USD 1000 seed fund.

The 2021 winner will be announced on 31st January 2021 on our official Facebook Page: @StartupXs

Eligibility
It’s an open call. Participation is open to any individual or organization in any country unless prohibited by local or the United States law.
Be between 18 and 35 years
An organization led by youth like social enterprises, for-profit companies, non-profit organizations, and researchers in any country can apply
Priority is given to early-stage and growth-stage startup or a social enterprise working in an innovative product or idea
Application Requirements
The idea must be submitted in the form of a business proposal with budget details
Proposal submitted to other donors, grants, or funding resources can be submitted
The proposal submitted must be created within the past five (5) years
A proposal can be of any length – but a 5-page maximum is recommended
All submissions must be contained in one MS Word or PDF format (annexes are not allowed)
All submissions must be in English contained in one MS Word or PDF format
You may submit any number of proposals
You must certify that the proposal submitted is original (any attempt of plagiarism will lead to disqualification)
All submissions must be through our online form. Submission by email will not be accepted.
The application must be submitted before the deadline

For full rules and guidelines please click here.

The deadline for the submission is 31st December 2020 (23:59 GMT).

Overview
0
Closed
December 31
Organizer	StartupXs
Website	Visit website
Targets

title: Fuzé by Digital Africa Pitching Sessions
subtitle: Fuzé by Digital Africa offre des cours en ligne et des ressources d'apprentissage aux entrepreneurs technologiques africains en phase de pré-amorçage.  Il propose des tickets de financement de 20 000€, 30 000€, 50 000€ et 100 000€ adaptés au stade de développement de chaque startup.  Des sessions de pitch sont organisées au Mozambique, au Zimbabwe et en Zambie.
meta_title: Fuzé: Financement pour Startups Tech Africaines
meta_description: Fuzé by Digital Africa offre des financements (20k€-100k€) et des ressources aux startups tech africaines en phase de pré-amorçage. Postulez maintenant!
organizer_name:
Explore
About
Sign in
Fuzé by Digital Africa Pitching Sessions

A unique and innovative solution for pre-seed African entrepreneurs

Fuzé by Digital Africa is a facility dedicated to entrepreneurs who are preparing or who have just launched their tech startups in Africa. We give access to tickets of €20K, €30K, €50K and €100K adapted to your stage of development. By focusing on a specific stage that is currently underserved and underfunded in Africa, Fuzé is a unique model on the continent.

Fuzé by Digital Africa is currently organizing pitching sessions in different Southern Africa countries, namely Mozambique, Zimbabwe and Zambia.

Mozambique: November 18-20
Zimbabwe: November 21-23
Zambia: November 25-27

Startups can apply here to be considered: https://application.fuze.digital-africa.co/

Overview
0
Closed
November 15
Organizer	Digital Africa
Website	Visit website
Targets	Mozambique, Zambia, Zimbabwe
Sectors	Sector agnostic

title:
Airmon Group Africa – Silo Africa
Transforming Grain Storage in Kenya Through Digitized Household Silos.
subtitle: Airmon Group Africa lutte contre les pertes post-récoltes au Kenya en fournissant des silos ménagers numérisés aux petits exploitants agricoles.  La plateforme Granary permet aux agriculteurs de bénéficier de meilleurs prix et d'économies d'échelle, assurant ainsi la sécurité alimentaire et améliorant la nutrition des ménages.
meta_title: Silos numérisés pour agriculteurs au Kenya
meta_description: Airmon Group Africa combat les pertes post-récoltes grâce à des silos ménagers connectés, améliorant la sécurité alimentaire et les revenus des petits exploitants au Kenya.
main_image_alt: Silos de stockage de céréales numérisés dans une ferme kényane
description: We prevent post-harvest crop losses by leveraging technology and providing digitized household silos to smallholder farmers on-farm to transform grain storage. Our Granary platform cushions smallholder farmers from the pressure of selling at low market prices during harvesting season and instead leverage higher market prices and economies of scale. With household silos, we will be able provide grain security to children, expectant mothers and breast feeding mothers which will improve household nutrition and health. Grains can easily reach areas with high demand like ASAL regions. Sectors Agribusiness, Internet of things (IoT), Software as a Service Location Nairobi, Kenya Stage Sign in to view details Markets Sign in to view details Customer model Sign in to view details Revenue Sign in to view details Contact Sign in to view details Social media
draft_summary: Airmon Group Africa utilise la technologie pour révolutionner le stockage des céréales au Kenya.  Des silos ménagers connectés aident les petits agriculteurs à réduire les pertes et à accéder à de meilleurs marchés.  Cela améliore la sécurité alimentaire et la nutrition des familles.

title: Explorar Ventures
subtitle: Explorar Ventures offre un aperçu des opportunités d'investissement, la possibilité de trouver ou de devenir un mentor, et fournit des ressources d'apprentissage en ligne.  Restez informé des actualités des startups grâce à des ressources et du contenu exclusifs.
meta_description: Découvrez Explorar Ventures : mentorat, formations en ligne, actualités startups africaines. Trouvez des opportunités d'investissement et développez votre entreprise.
description: Visión general de las oportunidades. Buscar mentores o convertirse en uno. Cursos en línea y materiales de aprendizaje. Noticias relacionadas con el inicio. © 2025 VC4A. All rights reserved.
draft_summary: Explorar Ventures est une plateforme qui propose des opportunités d'investissement, un réseau de mentorat et des ressources éducatives pour les entrepreneurs africains.  Restez à jour sur les dernières actualités et les meilleures pratiques.

title:
Amra Tech
Tech driven solutions, human-centred impact!
subtitle: Amra Tech est une entreprise technologique ghanéenne dirigée par des femmes, offrant des solutions logicielles complètes, des services OEM et des innovations.  Elle se concentre sur des solutions technologiques inclusives et locales pour les secteurs de la santé, de l'agriculture et des finances, contribuant à la numérisation des services publics et privés.
meta_title: Amra Tech: Solutions Tech au Ghana
meta_description: Amra Tech, entreprise ghanéenne dirigée par des femmes, fournit des solutions logicielles, services OEM et innovations dans l'Agritech, la HealthTech et les finances.
description: We are a Ghanaian female-led tech company delivering end-to-end software solutions, OEM services, and innovations by building inclusive, locally-driven tech solutions that power key sectors including healthcare, agriculture, and finance while enabling systems that support the digitalization of public and private services aligned with national and global goals.” Sectors Agritech, HealthTech, Medical equipment and supplies Location Accra, Ghana Stage Sign in to view details Markets Sign in to view details Customer model Sign in to view details Contact Sign in to view details Social media
draft_summary: Amra Tech développe des solutions technologiques inclusives pour l'agriculture, la santé et les finances au Ghana.  L'entreprise propose des solutions logicielles complètes et des services OEM.  Elle contribue à la digitalisation des services publics et privés.

title:
Orange MEMO Startup Incubator
Enabling Artisan Entrepreneurs for a 4ir Future
subtitle: Orange MEMO Startup Incubator soutient les entrepreneurs artisanaux d'Afrique subsaharienne en leur offrant incubation, accès à des financements et partenariats d'entreprises.  Notre programme utilise un cadre de croissance stratégique pour aider les startups à évoluer efficacement et à réussir sur le marché.
meta_description: Orange MEMO Incubation soutient les startups technologiques et créatives d'Afrique subsaharienne, de l'idée à l'investissement.  Incubation, financement, partenariats.
main_image_alt: Image de l'incubateur Orange MEMO, mettant en valeur les entrepreneurs et le travail collaboratif.
description: We offer business incubation, deal origination, and corporate partnership services through our proprietary Strategic Growth Framework, designed to help township & rural based startups scale effectively. Our services provide the necessary tools and insights for startups to secure funding, optimize operations, and navigate the corporate ecosystem. The business potential lies in our focus on high-growth sectors like technology and creative industries within Sub-Saharan Africa, which are underserved in terms of structured mentorship and corporate integration. Our goal is to become a leading hub for African entrepreneurs, supporting their journey from idea to investment readiness, unlocking opportunities in under-t Sectors Consulting and business development, Educational services Location Sandton, South Africa Stage Sign in to view details Markets Sign in to view details Customer model Sign in to view details Contact Sign in to view details Social media
draft_summary: L'incubateur Orange MEMO aide les startups basées dans les zones rurales et urbaines d'Afrique subsaharienne à se développer.  Il offre des services d'incubation, d'accès au financement et de partenariats.  Son objectif est de devenir un centre de référence pour les entrepreneurs africains.

title: AgriBlue.AI Accelerator
subtitle: L'accélérateur AgriBlue.AI forme les startups d'IA à la régénération agricole et aquacole.  Il connecte les entrepreneurs à des investisseurs et leaders du secteur pour développer des solutions durables et évolutives face à la demande alimentaire croissante.
meta_title: AgriBlue.AI Accelerator: IA pour l'agriculture régénératrice
meta_description: AgriBlue.AI soutient les startups d'IA pour une agriculture régénératrice durable.  Rejoignez notre programme d'accélération et obtenez du financement.
organizer_name:
Explore
About
Sign in
AgriBlue.AI Accelerator

Pioneering AI for Regenerative Farming

AgriBlue.AI bridges the gap between farmers and AI innovators to revolutionise agriculture and aquaculture, ensuring a resilient and regenerative food system

The programme connects sustainable AI startups with investors and industry leaders and investment community through networking & pitch events

The AgriBlue.AI Accelerator Programme aims to support regenerative agriculture ventures, both on land and at sea, scale and secure funding to co-develop scalable, real-world solutions to the surging food demand

Areas of focus.

Smart Feeding
AI-optimized nutrition for crops, livestock, and aquaculture, reducing waste and accelerating growth

Water Quality Monitoring
Real-time AI analysis of soil and water conditions to maintain healthy, thriving ecosystems

Disease Detection
Early pathogen identification using AI and IoT, minimising chemical use and preventing large-scale losses

Biodiversity Tracking
AI-driven monitoring of land and marine ecosystems to support regenerative farming and conservation efforts

title:
IDTech (yes:id)
Digital identity creating and unlocking digital economies.
subtitle: yes:id fournit une solution de vérification d'identité numérique pour les entreprises des secteurs Fintech, Insurtech, Télémedicine et Edtech en Afrique.  La plateforme aide à connecter les communautés mal desservies aux services numériques, en se concentrant sur la création d'une économie numérique inclusive.
meta_title: IDTech (yes:id): Vérification d'identité numérique en Afrique
meta_description: yes:id aide les entreprises Fintech, Insurtech, Télémedicine et Edtech à vérifier leurs clients et à connecter les communautés mal desservies en Afrique.
main_image_alt: Image de la plateforme yes:id ou une image représentative de l'identité numérique en Afrique
description: yes:id allows businesses and new emerging players in fintech, insurtech, telemedicine and edtech to verify their customers using our digital identity verification stack. Where such businesses are looking to reach and provide services to underserved communities such as semi-formal workers unions, yes:id provides digital registration services to these groups. With the growth of digital services, the reality that almost 50% of the continent still lacks proof of identity, being able to establish trust in the new digital economy in Africa is critical. Sectors Fintech, Information technology, Software as a Service Location Quatre Bornes, Mauritius Stage Sign in to view details Markets Sign in to view details Customer model Sign in to view details Revenue Sign in to view details Contact Sign in to view details Social media
draft_summary: yes:id résout le problème de manque d'identité numérique en Afrique, en permettant aux entreprises de vérifier leurs clients et en connectant les communautés mal desservies aux services numériques.  La solution est cruciale pour le développement d'une économie numérique inclusive.

title: Venture Nest Innovation Program v1.0
subtitle: Le programme Venture Nest Innovation Program v1.0 offre des cours et du matériel pédagogique en ligne pour aider les entrepreneurs ghanéens à transformer leurs idées en solutions commercialisables.  Il vise à surmonter les défis liés à l'innovation interne et à la création de nouvelles entreprises.  Ce programme est soutenu par Boxplay Ventures et VC4A.
meta_title: Venture Nest Innovation Program: Lancez votre startup au Ghana
meta_description: Développez votre startup grâce au programme Venture Nest au Ghana. Cours en ligne, réseautage et soutien pour transformer vos idées en réalité.  Inscrivez-vous avant le 25 juillet !
organizer_name:
Explore
About
Sign in
Venture Nest Innovation Program v1.0
From Idea to Market
1
Month left
August 20, 2025
Apply
Venture Nest Innovation Program v1.0

From Idea to Market

Apply

The entrepreneurial ecosystem in Ghana is experiencing signiﬁcant growth and international interest. However, many established organizations, young entrepreneurs and startups face challenges in  achieving internal innovation, translating ideas into marketable solutions, and navigating the complexities of new venture creation.

Venture Nest is an innovation and learning hub that powers the next generation of entrepreneurs, creators, and ecosystem builders. As the dedicated capacity-building arm of Boxplay Ventures, Venture Nest delivers the practical knowledge, community, and exposure that early-stage entrepreneurs need to thrive. Venture Nest brings together startups, investors, trainers, and visionaries to build Africa’s next growth frontier.

This program is uniquely tailored to underscore the signiﬁcance of translating imaginative ideas into practical, actionable ventures, moving beyond mere conceptualization.

4 weeks (16-hour total immersive experience).
Four distinct 4-hour sessions, exclusively on consecutive Saturdays.
Onsite, Hands-on, collaborative problem-solving, user-centered mindset.
Each participant will develop at least one validated venture concept focused on product-market ﬁt.

What You’ll Get

Expert-led training and facilitation
Idea Validation
Pitch Deck
Access to Venture Nest’s Community & Co-working Space
Curated learning materials and toolkits
Potential partner matching
Certificate of Completion

Program cost = GHS 1500

Early bird discount of 15% before 25th July

Overview
1
Month left
Closes August 20, 2025
Program dates	Aug 23-Sep 13,
Organizer	Boxplay Ventures
Website	Visit website
Targets	Ghana
Sectors	Sector agnostic

8. Decent Work and Economic Growth, 9. Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure

title:
Tradetec Digital Transformation & Technology
Smart document management and digitization in Mozambique
subtitle: Tradetec aide les institutions mozambicaines à surmonter les défis de la gestion documentaire physique en proposant des solutions de numérisation intelligentes, un stockage cloud sécurisé et des processus standardisés.  Nous transformons la culture documentaire des organisations pour une efficacité accrue et un accès sécurisé aux informations.
meta_description: Tradetec offre des solutions de gestion documentaire intelligente au Mozambique, aidant les institutions à numériser leurs archives, améliorer l'efficacité et sécuriser les données.
main_image_alt: Image de la solution de gestion documentaire de Tradetec au Mozambique
description: In Mozambique, thousands of institutions struggle with disorganized physical archives, document loss, and slow processes due to a lack of digitization. Tradetec emerges as a response to this reality, offering smart and accessible document management solutions — from physical organization to digitization, cloud storage, and secure access with user-level permissions. We help governments, schools, hospitals, banks, and companies regain control over their information through standardized processes, technology tailored to the local context, and a human-centered approach. More than just digitizing, we transform the document culture within organizations. The market is undergoing a digital transition, and Tradetec is positioned to lead this shift with a scalable, sustainable model ready to impact institutions across Mozambique. Sectors Business services, Enterprise software, Information technology Location Maputo, Mozambique Stage Sign in to view details Markets Sign in to view details Customer model Sign in to view details Contact Sign in to view details Social media
draft_summary: Tradetec révolutionne la gestion documentaire au Mozambique.  Nous offrons des solutions de numérisation, de stockage cloud et d'accès sécurisé aux données pour les gouvernements, les écoles, les hôpitaux et les entreprises.  Notre approche humaine et notre modèle évolutif transforment la culture documentaire des organisations.
